lang_colony_layout_description: Sparse pine and oak woodland. A welcoming and hospitable place to build a home.
A gentle river winds through this flowery field.
A mysterious swamp, overrun with wild willows and weeds.
An inland lagoon surrounded by sandy beaches and tropical vegetation.
Dark basalt rock and flowing lava make for a dangerous and uninviting locale.
Empty and desolate. An ideal blank canvas.
